ie.gmit.dip

Class Swapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.dip.Swapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISwapper

    public class Swapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISwapper
    A swapper that uses an IParser and IMapper to swap input strings and produce outputs. Uses an initialization step where it reads common words and synonyms from ITextFile instances.
    Author:
    caoimhekilbride

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(ITextFile synonyms,
                       ITextFile commonWords)
        Initializes the Swapper by using a text file for synonyms and another for common words. The implementation uses an IMapper to map common words with synonyms and a parser to break text file lines into words. The complexity is O(n * m) where n and m is the number of words in the common words and the synonyms files respectively.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface ISwapper

      • replace

        public java.lang.String replace(java.lang.String input)
        Replaces the words in the input string with their simplified synonyms.
        Specified by:
        replace in interface ISwapper
        Parameters:
        input - The input string to be replaced.
        Returns:
        A new string which is the input string with each word replaced with a simplified synonym.
